name: Yandere Runner Prototype
description:
You play as Ichiro! There's a girl, Lumi chasing him and she's blood thirsty for your love! You must run and survive!

Collect coins to increase your Speed. Hitting Hazards slows you down. Once Lumi gets near you, you're done for!

Controls:

Press W or Up Arrow to jump.

When against a wall, hold up arrow to climb
